channel.title: Spring JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SEC-110] ProviderManager does not properly handle ConcurrentLoginException
item.description: The ProviderManager will incorrectly return an authentication object and fire AuthenticationSuccessEvent when a ConcurrentLoginException is thrown.
item.summary: ProviderManager does not properly handle ConcurrentLoginException

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This issue has been migrated to https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-security/issues/371
